程序包 org.activiti.workflow.simple.converter.step

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    DefaultFormPropertyTypes  
    StepDefinitionConverter<U extends StepDefinition,T>
    A class that is responsible for converting a single StepDefinition to all required artifacts needed.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BaseStepDefinitionConverter<U extends StepDefinition,T>
    Base class that can be used for StepDefinitionConverter, contains utility-methods.
    ChoiceStepsDefinitionConverter
    StepDefinitionConverter for converting a ChoiceStepsDefinition to the following BPMN 2.0 structure: __ t1___ | | + -- ...---+- | | - txxx---
    DelayStepDefinitionConverter  
    FeedbackStepDefinitionConverter  
    HumanStepDefinitionConverter
    StepDefinitionConverter for converting a HumanStepDefinition to a UserTask.
    ParallelStepsDefinitionConverter
    StepDefinitionConverter for converting a ParallelStepsDefinition to the following BPMN 2.0 structure: __ t1___ | | + -- ...---+- | | - txxx---
    ScriptStepDefinitionConverter
